src:
Selamat Bertugas Kapolri Jenderal Polisi Idham Azis
01 Nov 2019, 12:13 by Miechell Octovy Koagouw



Selamat Bertugas Kapolri Jenderal Polisi Idham Azis



Selamat Bertugas Kapolri Jenderal Polisi Idham Azis



Selamat Bertugas Kapolri Jenderal Polisi Idham Azis


KBRN, Jakarta : Presiden Joko Widodo (Jokowi) resmi melantik Jenderal Polisi Idham Azis sebagai Kepala Kepolisian Negara Republik Indonesia (Kapolri) di Istana Negara Jakarta, Jumat (1/11/2019).Dalam pelantikan tersebut, Presiden Jokowi menyematkan kenaikan pangkat Idham Azis dari Komisaris Jenderal Polisi menjadi Jenderal Polisi alias bintang empat penuh.Tongkat komando kepemimpinan Polri juga sudah diserahkan Kepala Negara kepada Idham sebagai tanda dirinya siap bertugas hari ini juga.Kapolri Jenderal Polisi Idham Azis menggantikan pendahulunya, Jenderal Polisi Tito Karnavian, yang saat ini sudah mengemban tugas baru sebagai Menteri Dalam Negeri (Mendagri) dalam Kabinet Indonesia Maju periode 2019-2024.Sehari sebelumnya, Ketua DPR RI Puan Maharani menyatakan Kepala Kepolisian Negara Republik Indonesia (Kapolri) baru akan langsung disambut sejumlah tantangan, diantaranya, pengamanan Pilkada Serentak 2020, pencegahan radikalisme, penegakan hukum dan pencegahan aksi terorisme dengan mengedepankan deteksi dini intelijen, serta kejahatan cyber dan kejahatan transnasional.  "Tugas berat menghadang Kapolri baru. Tapi melihat rekam jejaknya dan paparan program saat  fit and proper test, kami optimis Kapolri baru akan bisa mengatasi tantangan-tantangan itu,” ujar Puan, di Paripurna DPR, Kompleks Parlemen Senayan, Jakarta, Kamis (31/10/2019).Secara khusus, Puan berharap nakhoda baru Polri bisa memberi perhatian khusus pada kejahatan narkoba yang makin masif dan menyasar generasi muda. Kepada Kapolri baru, Puan berpesan  segera melakukan konsolidasi internal setelah dilantik oleh Presiden Joko Widodo (Jokowi). “Konsolidasi internal penting untuk menyatukan gerak langkah sebagai jiwa korsa menghadapi tantangan yang makin kompleks,” imbuhnya.Setelah konsolidasi internal, Puan menyarankan Kapolri baru berkoordinasi dengan penegak hukum lain. “Agar tidak terjadi miskomunikasi yang membuat rakyat bingung," tegas Puan. Selain itu, ”Ketua DPR Puan maharani mengharap Polri terus meningkatkan kemampuan profesional sesuai perkembangan zaman. "Dan tentu saja harus terus dekat dengan warga sebagai pengayom masyarakat,” tandasnya.Sebelumnya, Ketua DPR RI memimpin sidang paripurna untuk mendengarkan pemaparan hasi fit and proper test Komisi III DPR RI terhadap calon Kapolri baru, Komisaris Jenderal Polisi (Komjen Pol) Idham Azis. Dari 575 anggota DPR RI, hadir 361 orang dan semua secara aklamasi menyetujui Komjen Pol Idham Azis sebagai Kapolri baru menggantikan Jenderal Polisi Tito Karnavian."Setuju," jawab seluruh peserta atas disetujuinya Komjen Pol Idham Azis sebagai Kapolri.Pelantikan Komjen Pol Idham Azis akan dilakukan Presiden Joko Widodo (Jokowi) pada Jumat, 1 November 2019 dengan kenaikan pangkat menjadi Jenderal Polisi Idham Azis.
text:
Congratulations on duty Chief of Police General Police Idham Azis
01 Nov 2019, 12:13 by Miechell Octovy Koagouw



Congratulations on duty Chief of Police General Police Idham Azis



Congratulations on duty Chief of Police General Police Idham Azis



Congratulations on duty Chief of Police General Police Idham Azis


KBRN, Jakarta: President Joko Widodo (Jokowi) officially inaugurates Police General Idham Azis as Chief of the Republic of Indonesia National Police (Kapolri) at the State Palace in Jakarta, Friday (1/11/2019) .In the inauguration, President Jokowi pinned the promotion of Idham Azis from Commissioner General of Police to Police General aka full four-star. The Polri leadership command has also been handed over by the Head of State to Idham as a sign that he is ready to serve today. His new assignment as Minister of Home Affairs (Mendagri) in the Advanced Indonesian Cabinet for the 2019-2024 period. The previous day, the Speaker of the Indonesian Parliament Puan Maharani stated that the Head of the Indonesian National Police (Kapolri) would immediately be greeted with a number of challenges, including, securing the Simultaneous Election 2020, prevention radicalism, law enforcement and the prevention of acts of terrorism by men promote early detection of intelligence, as well as cyber and transnational crime. "The daunting task facing the new National Police Chief. But looking at his track record and program exposure during the fit and proper test, we are optimistic that the new National Police Chief will be able to overcome these challenges," Puan said, at the DPR Plenary, Parliament Complex Senayan, Jakarta, Thursday (31 / 10/2019) Specifically, Puan hopes that the new police captain can pay special attention to drug crimes that are increasingly massive and targeting the younger generation, to the new National Police Chief, Puan ordered immediate internal consolidation after being sworn in by President Joko Widodo (Jokowi). internally it is important to unite the steps of the korsa soul to face increasingly complex challenges, "he added. After internal consolidation, Puan suggested that the new police chief coordinate with other law enforcers." In order to avoid miscommunication that makes people confused, "said Puan. In addition, "DPR Speaker Puan Maharani hopes that the National Police will continue to improve their professional abilities in accordance with the times. "And of course it must continue to be close to citizens as community guards," he said. Previously, the Chairperson of the Indonesian House of Representatives chaired a plenary session to hear the presentation of the results of the House of Representatives Commission III fit and proper test on new National Police candidates, Commissioner General of Police (Komjen Pol) Idham Azis Of the 575 members of the Indonesian House of Representatives, 361 were present and all unanimously approved the Police Commissioner General Idham Azis as the new National Police Chief replacing Police General Tito Karnavian. carried out by President Joko Widodo (Jokowi) on Friday, November 1, 2019 with the promotion to become Police General Idham Azis.
